thesis: Mean reversion on RELIANCE: Long when Close < (1 - std_dev) * SMA(27). Exit if strategy daily return < -3%. (Missing profit exit)
supporting_notes:
Indicators used:
Close
SMA on close with moving_average_window = 27 (stored as ma20)
Log daily returns: log(Close_t / Close_{t-1})
Std dev of daily returns (std) as a volatility threshold
Exact entry trigger:
Go long when Close_t < (1 - std) * SMA27_t
Position handling:
Once long (pos == "L"), it keeps position = 1 until exit
Exact exit trigger:
If strategy_returns_t = daily_returns_t * position_t < -0.03, exit to flat on next loop (pos_exit = True)
Not used:
No RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, Golden Cross logic
Data source (algo-backend.ipynb)

It is coded to fetch from API using nsepy.get_history(...), not CSV upload.
